document.full_text: boston starter josh beckett looked back to his best on sunday, delivering a dominant two-hitter performance to lead the red sox to a 4-0 victory over bitter rivals the new york yankees.
document.title: boston's beckett dominates yankees, red sox win 4-0
lines_and_colors: boston starter josh beckett looked back to his best on sunday, delivering a dominant two-hitter performance to lead the red sox to a 4-0 victory over bitter rivals the new york yankees.
